title: Clockwork Avian
text: FlyingClockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it., : Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
